Author: GitHub
Description:
Why do open source maintainers hold back their questions? Christian Grobmeier argues that we need "protected environments" where contributors can ask "stupid questions" without fear. Discover how the community aspect of the GitHub Secure Open Source Fund is helping maintainers grow and support each other.

#OpenSource #Developer #Maintainer

Title: Why maintainers need safe spaces to ask "dumb" questions
